game.name: Money Bath VR / 札束風呂VR
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A dream app that allows you to experience a money bath with VR! In addition, the life of the millionaire is fully reproduced! More fun girls will entertain you (rich man)! !
game.shortDescriptionEn: A dream app that allows you to experience a money bath with VR! In addition, the life of the millionaire is fully reproduced! More fun girls will entertain you (rich man)! !

reviewHighlights.text: 5,500원에 30분 햄버거 단품을 사 먹는 것을 추천
존나 거지같은 조작성 그냥 이동하는것도 제대로 안됨
